title: New rift Herald not spawning after using it.

embed.description: Watch TechShadow545's League of Legends video: A bug with the rift. - Plays.tv

body: As You can see in the video. The rift herald when activated didn't spawn.

replies.body: Yeah that does look like a bug (and I don't mean Kha'Zix :D). It looks like your ultimate stopped the channel for some reason, usually only CC should be doing that.
